JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Responsibilities    As a fully contributing member of the application development team will be assigned to small projects or to phase(s) of larger project(s) and will be required to carry out all the SDLC activities (Analysis, CUT, debugging, build and release)     Should be able to use Inheritance, Polymorphism during Class/Interface Design.     Should understand SOLID Design Principles, Design Patterns.     Strong in SQL Query Tuning and code tuning     Experience in React and Redux would be added advantage     Build and Promote the software to development and QA environments     Supervise mentor a small team of 4 to 6 developers in both Technical and functional domains.     Apply programming tools, procedures, functions and routines towards delivering the assigned task or activity with little or no guidance.     Should have participated in, and be familiar with, Agile (Scrum) project methodologies    Requirements    . NET Core, C# programming language, MVC, WEB API     Entity Framework Core, SQL Server 2016,     GraphQL     React V 16.5, TypeScript, Redux V 4.0.1, React GraphQL     HTML 5 and CSS     Any ORM, Castle Windsor or other IoC     Web service architecture and .NET web service Programming techniques, jQuery
